articles.content: If there's one name on every Indian's lips right now, it's that of Sunil Chhetri, the captain of the Indian football team, who lifted the 2023 Bangabandhu SAFF Championship in Bengaluru last week. Th… [+2729 chars]

articles.title: Gavaskar defends India fans in savage response to ‘condescending’ commentators - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Sunil Gavaskar had a no-holds-barred remark on overseas commentators' remarks on Indian fans behaviour, while drawing a parallel with Ashes series. | Cricket
articles.content: The Ashes series is known for its intense drama and controversies and so far, the 2023 edition of the iconic rivalry has lived up to its reputation. From controversies over dismissals to pitch invasi… [+1897 chars]
